attributes.action: change the name of the St Helens suburb from 'Thatto Heath' to 'Thatto Heath Ledger' in honour of the late actor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heath Ledger was one of the most gifted actors of his generation playing such diverse roles as Scott in Home and Away and a gay in Brokeback Mountain.What better way is there for the people of St Helens to mark his passing than to rename this area?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
